channel.title: XKey Updates
channel.description: XKey - Vietnamese Input Method for macOS

item.title: Version 1.2.17 (Build 20251230)
item.description:
What's New

Refine English detection and preserve mid-sentence state

  • Add hasEnglishStartPattern to detect English words without conflicting with Telex mark keys (s/f/r/x/j)
  • Expand English detection rules with 13 comprehensive patterns including:

* Consonant clusters (bl, cl, str, spr, etc.)

* Double consonants (bb, cc, dd, etc.)

* Silent letter patterns (kn, wr, ps, pn)

* Vowel combinations (ough, eigh, augh)

* Position-specific rules (x in middle, q not followed by u)

  • Fix mid-sentence typing by preserving state in reset() to prevent incorrect Forward Delete
  • Update build version to 20251230

Xem chi tiết trên GitHub
